dc:title: On Pilgrimage - May 1969
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Reflects on the abilities of a woman to press on with the "business of living" even as life is mixed with joys and anguish. Details coming speakers at their Friday night meetings. Shares stories of time with her daughter and grandchildren in Vermont, what each is doing with their lives. Remembers two dear friends, Marie Langlots and Fred Lindsey, who have recently died. Key words: Peter Maurin, obituary, Tamar.
